column5: This curation contains films that deal with characters facing very strong and sometimes degenerate sexual and/or romantic attraction. This attraction can be unidirectional or bidirectional, heterosexual or homosexual.

column2: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
The Worst Person in the World
In the Realm of the Senses
Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown
The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant
Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
2 or 3 Things I Know About Her
